Built by team of students from IIT Madras, Melvano is created keeping students in mind & strives to make learning engaging with guaranteed results.

Practice Questions

• The feed is intelligently optimized based on your interest & performance.

Mock Test
• Topic-wise Mock Tests
• Daily Live Tests :

Performance Analytics
• Analyse your JEE Main & JEE Advanced 2020 preparedness with in-depth performance analytic
• Performance reports cuts down your revision time by up to 60%

Daily Practice Problem sheets ( DPPs )

• Best Practice problems chapter-wise

Counselling

title: Melvano - Learning App for JEE, BITS, WBJEE & NEET

container.value: Indian Institute of Technology Madras, Chennai, Tamil Nadu - 600036

creator: Melvano Education Private Limited
descriptionHtml:
Melvano is felicitated as "Most Innovative Project" by IIT Madras in 2019

Melvano Learning App is the India’s largest learning platform built by Engineers from IIT Madras to create future IITians. The app offers comprehensive learning programs and has test prep courses for competitive exams like JEE Main, JEE Advanced and other state level engineering entrance exams.

Melvano is a virtual tutor that understands learning needs of every aspirant and creates tailored journey based on areas of improvement. The app offers more than 10,000+ Videos Lectures from India’s best teachers, Mock Test, Lecture Notes, Practice Questions (MCQs, Numerical Correct, Paragraph based), Video based Doubt clearing.

Melvano is committed to making learning more engaging and effective. The app personalizes learning based on each student’s pace and style of learning. 


The Melvano’s learning programs have been carefully designed by team of Engineers from IIT Madras to make student ace the exam with ease.

Features

• Personalized Journey - Melvano assistant creates tailored journey based on your areas of improvement & cuts down your preparation time.
• Personal Tutor - Melvano assistant is like a virtual Personal tutor guiding you at each step of your preparation.
• Video Lectures - Learn concepts with ease with more than 10,000+ engaging video lectures by top teachers in field of JEE
• Practice Questions - Put your knowledge to test by practicing our 30,000+ handpicked practice questions comprising of MCQs, Numerical answer, Paragraph based questions.
• Doubt clearing - Get instant Video solutions of all your doubts at one place.
• Mock Test - Test your exam preparedness with of 300+ Mock Test comprising of previous year JEE Problems.
• Statistics - Get detailed insights on your performance ranging from Areas of improvement to Type of mistakes.


Results
Two students scored Top 1 percentile and 25 students in Top 5 percentile in JEE Main 2020.

Accolades and Awards
• Felicitated with Sri Chinmay Deodhar award by IIT Madras for "Most Innovative Startup"
• Winner of Hednxt startup competition by Kingsoft and Krazybee
• Featured in India Today, Zee News, & several others national daily.
descriptionShort: Videos, Tests, MCQs, Doubt Clearing, Notes for JEE Main, JEE Advanced & CBSE

Melvano Learning App is the India’s largest learning platform built by Engineers from IIT Madras to create future IITians. The app offers comprehensive learning programs and has test prep courses for competitive exams like JEE Main, JEE Advanced and other state level engineering entrance exams.

Melvano is a virtual tutor that understands learning needs of every aspirant and creates tailored journey based on areas of improvement. The app offers more than 10,000+ Videos Lectures from India’s best teachers, Mock Test, Lecture Notes, Practice Questions (MCQs, Numerical Correct, Paragraph based), Video based Doubt clearing.

Melvano is committed to making learning more engaging and effective. The app personalizes learning based on each student’s pace and style of learning. 


The Melvano’s learning programs have been carefully designed by team of Engineers from IIT Madras to make student ace the exam with ease.

Features

• Personalized Journey - Melvano assistant creates tailored journey based on your areas of improvement & cuts down your preparation time.
• Personal Tutor - Melvano assistant is like a virtual Personal tutor guiding you at each step of your preparation.
• Video Lectures - Learn concepts with ease with more than 10,000+ engaging video lectures by top teachers in field of JEE
• Practice Questions - Put your knowledge to test by practicing our 30,000+ handpicked practice questions comprising of MCQs, Numerical answer, Paragraph based questions.
• Doubt clearing - Get instant Video solutions of all your doubts at one place.
• Mock Test - Test your exam preparedness with of 300+ Mock Test comprising of previous year JEE Problems.
• Statistics - Get detailed insights on your performance ranging from Areas of improvement to Type of mistakes.


Results
Two students scored Top 1 percentile and 25 students in Top 5 percentile in JEE Main 2020.

Accolades and Awards
• Felicitated with Sri Chinmay Deodhar award by IIT Madras for "Most Innovative Startup"
• Winner of Hednxt startup competition by Kingsoft and Krazybee
• Featured in India Today, Zee News, & several others national daily.

container.value: Indian Institute of Technology Madras, Chennai, Tamil Nadu - 600036

creator: Melvano
descriptionHtml:
Melvano is felicitated as "Most Innovative Project" by IIT Madras in 2019

Melvano Learning App is the India’s largest learning platform built by Engineers from IIT Madras to create future IITians. The app offers comprehensive learning programs and has test prep courses for competitive exams like JEE Main, JEE Advanced and other state level engineering entrance exams.

Melvano is a virtual tutor that understands learning needs of every aspirant and creates tailored journey based on areas of improvement. The app offers more than 10,000+ Videos Lectures from India’s best teachers, Mock Test, Lecture Notes, Practice Questions (MCQs, Numerical Correct, Paragraph based), Video based Doubt clearing.

Melvano is committed to making learning more engaging and effective. The app personalizes learning based on each student’s pace and style of learning. 


The Melvano’s learning programs have been carefully designed by team of Engineers from IIT Madras to make student ace the exam with ease.

Features

• Personalized Journey - Melvano assistant creates tailored journey based on your areas of improvement & cuts down your preparation time.
• Personal Tutor - Melvano assistant is like a virtual Personal tutor guiding you at each step of your preparation.
• Video Lectures - Learn concepts with ease with more than 10,000+ engaging video lectures by top teachers in field of JEE
• Practice Questions - Put your knowledge to test by practicing our 30,000+ handpicked practice questions comprising of MCQs, Numerical answer, Paragraph based questions.
• Doubt clearing - Get instant Video solutions of all your doubts at one place.
• Mock Test - Test your exam preparedness with of 300+ Mock Test comprising of previous year JEE Problems.
• Statistics - Get detailed insights on your performance ranging from Areas of improvement to Type of mistakes.


Results
Two students scored Top 1 percentile and 25 students in Top 5 percentile in JEE Main 2020.

Accolades and Awards
• Felicitated with Sri Chinmay Deodhar award by IIT Madras for "Most Innovative Startup"
• Winner of Hednxt startup competition by Kingsoft and Krazybee
• Featured in India Today, Zee News, & several others national daily.
descriptionShort: Videos, Tests, MCQs, Doubt Clearing, Notes for JEE Main, JEE Advanced & CBSE

container.value: 118/234, Gumti No.5, Kaushalpuri, Darshan Purwa, Kanpur, Uttar Pradesh 208012

creator: Melvano
descriptionHtml:
Melvano is one of India’s learning apps for JEE and NEET aspirants. The app offers mock tests and personalized courses for every user. It uses fun and unique teaching methods for JEE Main/ JEE Advanced/ NEET Preparation. 

At Melvano, we handhold every aspirant in their academic journey. Every student can interact with professionals throughout the course. They all have mentors who help them to crack exams. You can also get daily exam tips, shortcuts that will help you improve your speed, and for the best preparation for Exam Day.
 
What makes Melvano unique?

-The learning app offers a one-of-a-kind interactive experience to students with the help of mentors from different IITs and they get to experience in-class doubt solving, where a student can get his/her doubts cleared instantly.

-With Melvano a student can opt for foundation courses that are designed for a complete classroom program. The courses have learning videos, solved examples, and plenty of questions in JEE Main and Advanced exam patterns.

-There are also crash courses that have been set up for quick revisions before exams. The Crash course has personalized particular concepts for us to complete the molecule.

-Not to forget, Melvano delivers a question bank that contains more than 40,000+ questions and solved answers. 

Features:

Learn from the classes by engaging video lessons and personalized courses. 
Clear your doubts instantly from our dedicated mentors. They also keep track of your progress.

Revise your lessons with crash courses that secure your understanding of the concepts.

Prepare for JEE exams with topic-wise sample questions.
Analyze your progress with the results.

Melvano is the best option for JEE Main, JEE Advanced, and NEET prep for every aspirant. The vision of the organization to deliver students the best digital learning experience with the help of the latest technology and support service. The whole course is very engaging, and it is the best choice for foster learning.

container.value: 118/234, Gumti No.5, Kaushalpuri, Darshan Purwa, Kanpur, Uttar Pradesh 208012

creator: Melvano
descriptionHtml:
Melvano is one of India’s learning apps for JEE and NEET aspirants. The app offers mock tests and personalized courses for every user. It uses fun and unique teaching methods for JEE Main/ JEE Advanced/ NEET Preparation. 

At Melvano, we handhold every aspirant in their academic journey. Every student can interact with professionals throughout the course. They all have mentors who help them to crack exams. You can also get daily exam tips, shortcuts that will help you improve your speed, and for the best preparation for Exam Day.
 
What makes Melvano unique?

-The learning app offers a one-of-a-kind interactive experience to students with the help of mentors from different IITs and they get to experience in-class doubt solving, where a student can get his/her doubts cleared instantly.

-With Melvano a student can opt for foundation courses that are designed for a complete classroom program. The courses have learning videos, solved examples, and plenty of questions in JEE Main and Advanced exam patterns.

-There are also crash courses that have been set up for quick revisions before exams. The Crash course has personalized particular concepts for us to complete the molecule.

-Not to forget, Melvano delivers a question bank that contains more than 40,000+ questions and solved answers. 

Features:

Learn from the classes by engaging video lessons and personalized courses. 
Clear your doubts instantly from our dedicated mentors. They also keep track of your progress.

Revise your lessons with crash courses that secure your understanding of the concepts.

Prepare for JEE exams with topic-wise sample questions.
Analyze your progress with the results.

Melvano is the best option for JEE Main, JEE Advanced, and NEET prep for every aspirant. The vision of the organization to deliver students the best digital learning experience with the help of the latest technology and support service. The whole course is very engaging, and it is the best choice for foster learning.

title: Melvano : JEE/NEET Preparation

118/234, Gumti No.5, Kaushalpuri, Darshan Purwa, Kanpur, Uttar Pradesh 208012

creator: LEARN JEE/NEET CONCEPTS AND GET REWARDED
descriptionHtml:
Melvano is one of India’s Free learning apps for JEE and NEET aspirants that rewards users for learning. The app offers mock tests and personalized courses for every user. It uses fun and unique teaching methods for JEE Main/ JEE Advanced/ NEET Preparation. The students can earn Melvano coins each time they complete a course or take a test. The coins can be later redeemed for purchasing premium features.

At Melvano, we handhold every aspirant in their academic journey. Every student can interact with professionals throughout the course. They all have mentors who help them to crack exams. You can also get daily exam tips, shortcuts that will help you improve your speed, and for the best preparation for Exam Day.
 
What makes Melvano unique?

-The learning app offers a one-of-a-kind interactive experience to students with the help of mentors from different IITs and they get to experience in-class doubt solving, where a student can get his/her doubts cleared instantly.

-With Melvano a student can opt for foundation courses that are designed for a complete classroom program. The courses have learning videos, solved examples, and plenty of questions in JEE Main and Advanced exam patterns.

-There are also crash courses that have been set up for quick revisions before exams. The Crash course has personalized particular concepts for us to complete the molecule.

-Not to forget, Melvano delivers a question bank that contains more than 40,000+ questions and solved answers. 

Features:

Learn from the classes by engaging video lessons and personalized courses. 
Clear your doubts instantly from our dedicated mentors. They also keep track of your progress.

Revise your lessons with crash courses that secure your understanding of the concepts.

Prepare for JEE exams with topic-wise sample questions.
Analyze your progress with the results.

Melvano is the best option for JEE Main, JEE Advanced, and NEET prep for every aspirant. The vision of the organization to deliver students the best digital learning experience with the help of the latest technology and support service. The whole course is very engaging, and it is the best choice for foster learning.
descriptionShort: JEE Main, JEE Advanced & NEET Learning App That Rewards You For Learning

At Melvano, we redefine the learning experience through our innovative approach and dedicated mentors from prestigious IIT/AIIMS. Our unique pool of question selected by top educators from IIT/AIIMS, providing students with rigorous practice needed to crack the competitive exam.

Melvano is not just an app; it's your personal guide to success in JEE Main, JEE Advanced, and NEET. Our vision is to provide students with the pinnacle of digital learning, leveraging cutting-edge technology and unmatched support services. The entire course is designed to be engaging, making Melvano the definitive choice for fostering learning.

Comprehensive Learning Paths:

Choose from our meticulously crafted foundation courses, mirroring complete classroom programs. Dive into engaging video lessons, solved examples, and a plethora of questions, all structured in alignment with JEE Main and Advanced exam patterns.

Extensive Question Bank:

Access a wealth of knowledge with our extensive question bank, housing over 40,000+ meticulously crafted questions and detailed solutions. Prepare with precision and enhance your exam readiness.

Efficient Crash Courses:

Optimize your revision strategy with Melvano's crash courses, designed for swift and effective reviews before exams. Personalized focus on specific concepts ensures thorough understanding, empowering you for success.


Key Features:

Engage with video lessons and personalized courses for an immersive learning experience.
Instant doubt resolution with dedicated mentors tracking your progress.
Reinforce your understanding through comprehensive crash courses.
Prepare for JEE exams with topic-wise sample questions.
Analyze your progress through detailed results.

Join the ranks of successful students who have chosen Melvano, and experience the difference in your academic journey. Your success story begins here!

At Melvano, we redefine the learning experience through our innovative approach and dedicated mentors from prestigious IIT/AIIMS. Our unique pool of question selected by top educators from IIT/AIIMS, providing students with rigorous practice needed to crack the competitive exam.

Melvano is not just an app; it's your personal guide to success in JEE Main, JEE Advanced, and NEET. Our vision is to provide students with the pinnacle of digital learning, leveraging cutting-edge technology and unmatched support services. The entire course is designed to be engaging, making Melvano the definitive choice for fostering learning.

Comprehensive Learning Paths:

Choose from our meticulously crafted foundation courses, mirroring complete classroom programs. Dive into engaging video lessons, solved examples, and a plethora of questions, all structured in alignment with JEE Main and Advanced exam patterns.

Extensive Question Bank:

Access a wealth of knowledge with our extensive question bank, housing over 40,000+ meticulously crafted questions and detailed solutions. Prepare with precision and enhance your exam readiness.

Efficient Crash Courses:

Optimize your revision strategy with Melvano's crash courses, designed for swift and effective reviews before exams. Personalized focus on specific concepts ensures thorough understanding, empowering you for success.


Key Features:

Engage with video lessons and personalized courses for an immersive learning experience.
Instant doubt resolution with dedicated mentors tracking your progress.
Reinforce your understanding through comprehensive crash courses.
Prepare for JEE exams with topic-wise sample questions.
Analyze your progress through detailed results.

Join the ranks of successful students who have chosen Melvano, and experience the difference in your academic journey. Your success story begins here!
